biotools.summary:
Identifying miRNA synergism using multiple-intervention causal inference.

Studying multiple microRNAs (miRNAs) synergism in gene regulation could help to understand the regulatory mechanisms of complicated human diseases caused by miRNAs.

A novel method for identifying miRNA synergism using multiple-intervention causal inference.
